response.overview: A Music Video Tour of the NBA.Hosted by Tim Hardaway and Mitch Richmond, with a special appearance by Funkmaster Flex.NBA basketball and cool music...they go together like the pick and roll. NBA superstars and good friends Tim Hardaway and Mitch Richmond are your hosts of this tour of the NBA featuring these 11 themed music videos:"Bring in Da Noise, Bring in Da Funk"NBA Young Stars Aaliyah "Hot Like Fire" Looking Back Shaq "Men of Steel" Shaq Highlights Republica "Ready to Go" 1996-97 Chicago BullsNo Doubt "Just a Girl" WNBA's First Season Reel 2 Reel "I Like to Move It" Defensive Gems OMC "How Bizarre" BloopersJodeci "Get on Up" Amazing Dunks Yvette Michelle "DJ Keep Playin" Assists R. Kelly "I Believe I Can Fly" Michael Jordan Retrospective Blackstreet "No Diggity" Tim Hardaway and Mitch Richmond. Mfr.: NBA; 50 minutes; 1997, color VHS; NBA Music Video Series; Officially Licensed NBA Product.
response.title: NBA Grooves
